Step 2 - Creating the Manifest (manifest.json)

May 27, 2015 â€¢ Shahzeb Ihsan

Creating a manifest is simple enough:

{
   'name': 'Sample Chrome App',
   'description': 'A simple chrome app to accompany the tutorial at http://schaazzz.github.io/simple_tcp_client/',
   'version': '0.1',
   'app': {
      'background': {
         'scripts': ['js/background.js']
      }
   }
}

You can download manifest.json or checkout the "sandbox" branch at commit c5449c7d5c60b2e6eb946332ec34af8ee1b658df (refer to this post if you need a quick reference to Git commands for doing this).
